subject: Physical Fitness
title: Compression Garments
description: A quick, practical guide to Compression Garments.

hook.text: Tight sleeves, socks, and pants are everywhere in sport. Athletes swear by them. What does science say?

buildup.text: Compression garments apply graduated pressure, theoretically improving blood flow and reducing muscle vibration.

discovery.text: Evidence shows small but consistent benefits: reduced soreness, less swelling, and modestly faster recovery.

twist.text: During exercise, the performance benefits are minimal. The real value is wearing them after training.

climax.text: The psychological benefit may be as real as the physical. Athletes who believe they work, perform better in them.

punchline.text: Compression garments help modestly. The belief in them might help more.

quiz.question: When are compression garments most beneficial?
